title: Scanner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scan an authorized target each night. You will learn any hidden effects your target has. 'Hidden effects' are any positive or negative effects applied by another player that do not give any notification, such as frames, douses, or made astral.
- Purge an authorized target at night of any hidden effects. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will not detect or purge any hidden effects from the target's own attributes, such as detection vulnerability from (1353) Walkie/(1354) Talkie.
